description.value:
Trigger The performance concludes with fewer than 8 Pathos Points

Effect Sophreista screams in rage; all living creatures in the area must succeed at a @Check[will|dc:20] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2} on a critical failure).

details.description: Sophreista's ghost glows red, and shrieking in fury, she flies at her opponents.
details.disable: @Check[athletics|dc:18] (trained) to subdue the spirit, @Check[religion|dc:18] to calm the spirit, @Check[deception|dc:16] or @Check[diplomacy|dc:16] to talk the spirit down; two total successes are required to disable the haunt
details.routine: (1 action) Sophreista lashes out at the nearest living creature, dealing @Damage[(1d10+6)[bludgeoning]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:20|basic] save) and binding their fate to hers; a creature that critically fails their save is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Doomed]{Doomed 1} (maximum @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Doomed]{Doomed 3}).
